headline: Goldman Sachs now has a more neutral view on the rail sector
summary: Investing.com -- Goldman Sachs downgraded several rail stocks to Neutral in a note Monday, signaling a shift in its transportation sector outlook in favor of truckload and less-than-truckload (LTL) carriers, which it believes offer better risk-adjusted return potential as the freight cycle begins to turn.

headline: How Norfolk Southern keeps goods moving through hurricane season
